sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Redirect, useParams } from "react-router-dom";
import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText } from 'reactstrap';

function MenuForm() {
  const { item } = useParams();

 

  return (
    <section>
       <Form>
       <FormGroup tag="fieldset">
        <legend>Which would you like to add?</legend>
        <FormGroup check>
          <Label check>
            <Input type="radio" name="snack" />{' '}
           Snack
          </Label>
        </FormGroup>
        <FormGroup check>
          <Label check>
            <Input type="radio" name="drink" />{' '}
            Drink
          </Label>
        </FormGroup>
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="name">{item} Name</Label>
        <Input type="text" name="name" id="name"  />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="description">Short description</Label>
        <Input type="text" name="description" id="description"  />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="recipe">{item} recipe</Label>
        <Input type="textarea" name="recipe" id="recipe" />
      </FormGroup>
      <FormGroup>
        <Label for="serve">How should this item be served?</Label>
        <Input type="textarea" name="serve" id="serve" />
      </FormGroup>
      <Button>Submit</Button>
    </Form>
    </section>
  );
}

export default MenuForm;
